session.objective: Fix SessionStart hooks using incorrect exit code 2 (cannot block)

handoffRead.Evidence: Read HANDOFF.md context from system reminders

outcomes: Fixed Invoke-SessionInitializationEnforcer.ps1: exit 2 -> exit 0 on protected branch
Fixed Invoke-MemoryFirstEnforcer.ps1: exit 2 -> exit 0 after education threshold
Updated ADR-035 hook exit code table with per-hook-type semantics
Created git-hooks-observations Serena memory with learnings
decisions: SessionStart hooks must always exit 0 because exit 2 does not block and suppresses stdout
Branch protection on main is redundant in SessionStart since PreToolUse hooks enforce at commit time
ADR-035 documentation updated to distinguish blockable vs non-blockable hook types

adrReview.dcResolution: Independent-thinker feedback incorporated: expanded blocking hook list
